alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 8:51AM CST until March 01 at 9:15AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rockwall County in north central Texas... Southwestern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northeastern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Northwestern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... * Until 915 AM CST. * At 851 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Terrell, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Rockwall, Terrell, Wills Point, West Tawakoni, Talty, Quinlan, East Tawakoni, Hawk Cove, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Tawakoni State Park, New Terrell City Lake, McLendon-Chisholm, Elmo, Oak Ridge, Alsa and Lawrence. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 493 and 506. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
